statements: UPDATE project_documents SET document_name = 'Project Proposal' WHERE project_id = 1
UPDATE project_documents SET document_size = 1024, document_link = 'https://example.com/documents/project1' WHERE document_id = 5
UPDATE project_documents SET document_name = 'Proposal', document_link = 'https://example.com/proposal.pdf' WHERE project_id = 1 AND document_id = 1;
UPDATE project_documents SET document_size = 512, document_type = 'PDF' WHERE document_name = 'Report';
UPDATE ProjectDocuments SET document_name = 'Updated Project Plan' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectResources SET resource_type = 'PDF', resource_url = 'https://example.com/resource1.pdf' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectDocuments SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', document_type = 'Legal', document_size = 1024 WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectResources SET resource_name = 'New Resource Name', resource_status = 'Approved' WHERE resource_id = 5;
UPDATE projects SET project_name='New Project Name', project_description='Updated Description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE documents SET document_name='Updated Document Name', document_size=500 WHERE document_id = 3;
UPDATE projects SET project_description = 'New project description', project_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE documents SET document_name = 'Report Updated', document_size = 2048 WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE team_members SET member_name='John Doe' WHERE member_id=1;
UPDATE projects SET project_description='New description', project_name='Project X' WHERE project_id=3;
UPDATE team_members SET member_name='John Doe' WHERE member_id=1;
UPDATE documents SET document_name='New Document Name', document_type='Report' WHERE document_id=2;
UPDATE team_members SET member_name = 'John Doe' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET resource_type = 'Video' WHERE resource_id = 3;
UPDATE team_members SET member_email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 2;
